sentences.sContent: We need to consolidate and develop the current political situation of democracy, solidarity, liveliness, stability and harmony.
sentences.sContent_eng: We need to consolidate and develop the current political situation of democracy, solidarity, liveliness, stability and harmony.
sentences.sCn: 我们要巩固和发展民主团结、生动活泼、安定和谐的政治局面。

sentences.sContent: His understanding and opinions all please me; he wants nothing but a little more  liveliness, and that, if he marry  prudently, his wife may teach him.
sentences.sContent_eng: His understanding and opinions all please me; he wants nothing but a little more liveliness, and that, if he marry prudently, his wife may teach him.
sentences.sCn: 他的见识，他的言论，我都很喜欢。 他没有任何缺点，只不过稍欠活泼；关于这一点，只要他结婚结得当心一些，娶个好太太，他也许会让她给教好的。

sentences.sContent: She was really but a child, fresh, vivacious and aloof; it seemed that she always shook off every unpleasant thought with a liveliness that was, at once, charming, ingenuous and roguish.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was really but a child, fresh, vivacious and aloof; it seemed that she always shook off every unpleasant thought with a liveliness that was, at once, charming, ingenuous and roguish.
sentences.sCn: 她确实还只是个孩子，容光焕发，性情活泼，而又态度孤傲；似乎她随时能用她那娇媚、天真、淘气的活泼抖落掉一切不愉快的心思。

words.tran: 活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的
活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的
适于居住的；生活过得有价值的
